title: Le Nouveau Monde
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Elle a tort Jacinthe de se pencher comme ca' by Odette Joyeux.
description: Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”. On arrival in Canada, Olympe arouses suspiscion from the Canadian Customs. Stephane is considering abadonning Morales and his plans, but the threat to compromise Olympe with the smuggling of stolen goods is enough to keep him going. Lulu is still trying, not so subtly, to snatch the necklace from the children,  Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain. Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.
related_objects: Series; S002034; Le Tresor des Hollandais; Active; 1969
